trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by several <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> internal helper APIs.
trans-unit.target: 由若干 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 内部帮助器 API 引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用由系统提供的用来描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将新实例的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 属性初始化为系统提供的错误描述消息。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object that is transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor; or it returns `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数; 或者它将返回`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。
